p: The get_status RPC method provides the latest available information on:
Current number of pending transactions awaiting confirmation.
Recommended transaction fee (sat/byte) for timely confirmation given the current available hashrate.
The get_estimation RPC method provides the estimated confirmation time (in block intervals) for a given transaction, given its fee and the current available hashrate.
The send_raw_transaction RPC method submits a raw transaction.
The cancel RPC method cancels previously submitted transaction.
The login RPC method initiates an authenticated session using a JSON Web Token (JWT). Subsequent requests should include the returned JWT in the request headers (Authorization header).
The get_block_template RPC method exposes a non-canonical, potentially higher-value block template.
